verses.verse: I will sing <S%H7891><s%> of the mercies <S%H2617><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>: with my mouth <S%H6310><s%> will I make known <S%H3045><s%> your faithfulness <S%H530><s%> to all <S%H1755><s%> generations <S%H1755><s%>.

For I have said <S%H559><s%>, Mercy <S%H2617><s%> shall be built up <S%H1129><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>: your faithfulness <S%H530><s%> shall you establish <S%H3559><s%> in the very heavens <S%H8064><s%>.
I have made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with my chosen <S%H972><s%>, I have sworn <S%H7650><s%> unto David <S%H1732><s%> my servant <S%H5650><s%>,

Your seed <S%H2233><s%> will I establish <S%H3559><s%> for <S%H5704><s%> ever <S%H5769><s%>, and build up <S%H1129><s%> your throne <S%H3678><s%> to all <S%H1755><s%> generations <S%H1755><s%>. Selah <S%H5542><s%>.

And the heavens <S%H8064><s%> shall praise <S%H3034><s%> your wonders <S%H6382><s%>, O Lord <S%H3068><s%>: your faithfulness <S%H530><s%> also in the congregation <S%H6951><s%> of the saints <S%H6918><s%>.

For who in the heaven <S%H7834><s%> can be compared <S%H6186><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>? who among the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the mighty <S%H410><s%> can be likened <S%H1819><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>?

God <S%H410><s%> is greatly <S%H7227><s%> to be feared <S%H6206><s%> in the assembly <S%H5475><s%> of the saints <S%H6918><s%>, and to be had in reverence <S%H3372><s%> of all them that are about him <S%H5439><s%>.
O Lord <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, who is a strong <S%H2626><s%> Lord <S%H3050><s%> like unto you <S%H530><s%>? or to your faithfulness round about you <S%H5439><s%>?
You rule <S%H4910><s%> the raging <S%H1348><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%>: when the waves <S%H1530><s%> there arise <S%H7721><s%>, you still them <S%H7623><s%>.

You have broken <S%H1792><s%> Rahab <S%H7294><s%> in pieces <S%H1792><s%>, as one that is slain <S%H2491><s%>; you have scattered <S%H6340><s%> your enemies <S%H341><s%> with your strong <S%H5797><s%> arm <S%H2220><s%>.
The heavens <S%H8064><s%> are your <S%H776><s%>, the earth also is your <S%H8398><s%>: as for the world and the fullness <S%H4393><s%> there <S%H3245><s%>, you have founded them.
The north <S%H6828><s%> and the south <S%H3225><s%> you have created <S%H1254><s%> them <S%H8396><s%>: Tabor and Hermon <S%H2768><s%> shall rejoice <S%H7442><s%> in your name <S%H8034><s%>.
You have a mighty <S%H1369><s%> arm <S%H2220><s%>: strong <S%H5810><s%> is your hand <S%H3027><s%>, and high <S%H7311><s%> is your right hand <S%H3225><s%>.

Justice <S%H6664><s%> and judgment <S%H4941><s%> are the habitation <S%H4349><s%> of your throne <S%H3678><s%>: mercy <S%H2617><s%> and truth <S%H571><s%> shall go <S%H6923><s%> before your face <S%H6440><s%>.

Blessed <S%H835><s%> is the people <S%H5971><s%> that know <S%H3045><s%> the joyful sound <S%H8643><s%>: they shall walk <S%H1980><s%>, O Lord <S%H3068><s%>, in the light <S%H216><s%> of your favor <S%H6440><s%>.
In your name <S%H8034><s%> shall they rejoice <S%H1523><s%> all the day <S%H3117><s%>: and in your righteousness <S%H6666><s%> shall they be exalted <S%H7311><s%>.
For you are the glory <S%H8597><s%> of their strength <S%H5797><s%>: and in your favor <S%H7522><s%> our horn <S%H7161><s%> shall be exalted <S%H7311><s%>.
For the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is our defense <S%H4043><s%>; and the Holy One <S%H6918><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> is our king <S%H4428><s%>.

Then you spoke <S%H1696><s%> in vision <S%H2377><s%> to your holy one <S%H2623><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, I have laid <S%H7737><s%> help <S%H5828><s%> upon one that is mighty <S%H1368><s%>; I have exalted <S%H7311><s%> one chosen <S%H977><s%> out of the people <S%H5971><s%>.
I have found <S%H4672><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> my servant <S%H5650><s%>; with my holy <S%H6944><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> have I anointed him <S%H4886><s%>:
With whom my hand <S%H3027><s%> shall be established <S%H3559><s%>: my arm <S%H2220><s%> also shall strengthen him <S%H553><s%>.
The enemy <S%H341><s%> shall not exact <S%H5378><s%> upon him <S%H1121><s%>; nor the son of wickedness <S%H5766><s%> afflict him <S%H6031><s%>.
And I will beat down <S%H3807><s%> his foes <S%H6862><s%> before his face <S%H6440><s%>, and plague <S%H5062><s%> them that hate him <S%H8130><s%>.
But my faithfulness <S%H530><s%> and my mercy <S%H2617><s%> shall be with him <S%H8034><s%>: and in my name shall his horn <S%H7161><s%> be exalted <S%H7311><s%>.
I will set <S%H7760><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> also in the sea <S%H3220><s%>, and his right hand <S%H3225><s%> in the rivers <S%H5104><s%>.
He shall cry <S%H7121><s%> unto me <S%H1><s%>, You are my father, my God <S%H410><s%>, and the rock <S%H6697><s%> of my salvation <S%H3444><s%>.
Also I will make <S%H5414><s%> him my firstborn <S%H1060><s%>, higher <S%H5945><s%> than the kings <S%H4428><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>.
My mercy <S%H2617><s%> will I keep <S%H8104><s%> for him for evermore <S%H5769><s%>, and my covenant <S%H1285><s%> shall stand fast with him <S%H539><s%>.
His seed <S%H2233><s%> also will I make <S%H7760><s%> to endure for ever <S%H5703><s%>, and his throne <S%H3678><s%> as the days <S%H3117><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%>.
If his sons <S%H1121><s%> forsake <S%H5800><s%> my law <S%H8451><s%>, and walk <S%H3212><s%> not in my judgments <S%H4941><s%>;
If they break <S%H2490><s%> my statutes <S%H2708><s%>, and keep <S%H8104><s%> not my commandments <S%H4687><s%>;
Then will I visit <S%H6485><s%> their transgression <S%H6588><s%> with the rod <S%H7626><s%>, and their iniquity <S%H5771><s%> with stripes <S%H5061><s%>.
Nevertheless my lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> will I not utterly take <S%H6331><s%> from him <S%H530><s%>, nor allow my faithfulness to fail <S%H8266><s%>.
My covenant <S%H1285><s%> will I not break <S%H2490><s%>, nor alter <S%H8138><s%> the thing that is gone out <S%H4161><s%> of my lips <S%H8193><s%>.
Once <S%H259><s%> have I sworn <S%H7650><s%> by my holiness <S%H6944><s%> that I will not lie <S%H3576><s%> unto David <S%H1732><s%>.
His seed <S%H2233><s%> shall endure for ever <S%H5769><s%>, and his throne <S%H3678><s%> as the sun before me <S%H8121><s%>.
It shall be established <S%H3559><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> as the moon <S%H3394><s%>, and as a faithful <S%H539><s%> witness <S%H5707><s%> in heaven <S%H7834><s%>. Selah <S%H5542><s%>.
But you have cast off <S%H2186><s%> and abhorred <S%H3988><s%>, you have been angry <S%H5674><s%> with your anointed <S%H4899><s%>.
You have made void <S%H5010><s%> the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of your servant <S%H5650><s%>: you have profaned <S%H2490><s%> his crown <S%H5145><s%> by casting it to the ground <S%H776><s%>.
You have broken down <S%H6555><s%> all his hedges <S%H1448><s%>; you have brought <S%H7760><s%> his strong holds <S%H4013><s%> to ruin <S%H4288><s%>.
All that pass by <S%H5674><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> plunder <S%H8155><s%> him <S%H2781><s%>: he is a reproach to his neighbors <S%H7934><s%>.
You have set up <S%H7311><s%> the right hand <S%H3225><s%> of his adversaries <S%H6862><s%>; you have made all his enemies <S%H341><s%> to rejoice <S%H8055><s%>.
You have also turned <S%H7725><s%> the edge <S%H6697><s%> of his sword <S%H2719><s%>, and have not made him to stand <S%H6965><s%> in the battle <S%H4421><s%>.
You have made his glory <S%H2892><s%> to cease <S%H7673><s%>, and cast <S%H4048><s%> his throne <S%H3678><s%> down <S%H4048><s%> to the ground <S%H776><s%>.
The days <S%H3117><s%> of his youth <S%H5934><s%> have you shortened <S%H7114><s%>: you have covered <S%H5844><s%> him with shame <S%H955><s%>. Selah <S%H5542><s%>.
How long <S%H3068><s%>, Lord? will you hide <S%H5641><s%> yourself for ever <S%H5331><s%>? shall your wrath <S%H2534><s%> burn <S%H1197><s%> like fire <S%H784><s%>?
Remember <S%H2142><s%> how short <S%H2465><s%> my time is <S%H1254><s%>: therefore have you made all men <S%H1121><s%> in vain <S%H7723><s%>?

What man <S%H1397><s%> is he that lives <S%H2421><s%>, and shall not see <S%H7200><s%> death <S%H4194><s%>? shall he deliver <S%H4422><s%> his soul <S%H5315><s%> from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the grave <S%H7585><s%>? Selah <S%H5542><s%>.
Lord <S%H136><s%>, where are your former <S%H7223><s%> lovingkindnesses <S%H2617><s%>, which you swore <S%H7650><s%> unto David <S%H1732><s%> in your truth <S%H530><s%>?

Remember <S%H2142><s%>, Lord <S%H136><s%>, the reproach <S%H2781><s%> of your servants <S%H5650><s%>; how I do carry <S%H5375><s%> in my bosom <S%H2436><s%> the reproach of all the mighty <S%H7227><s%> people <S%H5971><s%>;
With which your enemies <S%H341><s%> have reproached <S%H2778><s%>, O Lord <S%H3068><s%>; with which they have reproached <S%H2778><s%> the footsteps <S%H6119><s%> of your anointed <S%H4899><s%>.
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be the Lord <S%H3068><s%> for evermore <S%H5769><s%>. Amen <S%H543><s%>, and Amen <S%H543><s%>.
